cvDescription.description: I am a highly motivated versatile person able to quickly investigate, evaluate, and adjust to new challenging contexts and lead a multicultural team towards effective and mutually beneficial solutions. I am an avid learner with a focus on details which makes absorption of advanced technical manuals and mastering of cutting-edge innovations my natural cup of tea. More than 7 years of experience in three successful companies where I engineered and curated through designing, developing, coding, deployment and software architecture stages more than 10 projects.
